original_text: They used gold to cover the boards and to make rings for the boards. The rings would hold the bars in place across the boards. They also covered the wooden bars with gold.
korean_text: 그 널판들을 금으로 싸고 그 널판에 띠를 꿸 금 고리를 만들고 그 띠도 금으로 쌌더라

sentences.original_text: They used gold to cover the boards
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 판자를 덮기 위해 금을 사용했습니다

sentences.original_text: and to make rings for the boards
The rings would hold the bars in place
They also covered the wooden bars with gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 나무 막대들을 금으로 덮었습니다
